ValidationRule.description: trying to prevent bad or not complete numbers from being manually entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED(AccountNumber)), NOT(ISBLANK(AccountNumber)), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), NOT(AND( REGEX(AccountNumber, "[0-9]+[-]([A-Z0-9]{9}|[A-Z0-9]{8}|[A-Z0-9]{4}|[A-Z0-9]{7})"), NOT(REGEX(AccountNumber, "[0-9]+[-]([A-Z0-9])\\1{2}[A-Z0-9]{1}")), NOT(REGEX(AccountNumber, "[0-9]+[-]([A-Z0-9])\\1{6}[A-Z0-9]{1}")), NOT(REGEX(AccountNumber, "[0-9]+[-](0)\\1{3}[A-Z0-9]{4}")), NOT(REGEX(AccountNumber, "[0-9]+[-](NPR)[A-Z0-9]*")) ) ) )
